name: Give Out
info: Choose someone to take this penalty instead!

name: Choose Buddy
info: Take this penalty with another player!

name: Give to Pair
info: Choose 2 players to take this penalty value instead!

name: Trivia
info: Answer this trivia question correctly or take this penalty!

name: Dare
info: Do the dare or take this penalty!
dareList: Stand up and give an Oscar speech to the group
Show the group your last three Google searches
Walk around the room like a crab for 30 seconds
Let someone give you a wedgie
Do an impression of someone in the room and have everyone guess who it is
Tell us your most embarrassing/goofy story from college
Balance your drink on your head for 10 seconds
Spin around 10 times and walk in a straight line
Trade shirts with someone for the rest of the game
Let someone draw on your face
Describe your worst date in 5 words
Tell the group your guilty pleasure tv show/movie/artist nobody knows you like

name: Versus
info: Complete the challenge with this other player. Loser takes the penalty!
